Class Fighter

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fighter

  • public class Fighter
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Fighter()
      Creates a default fighter, in this case Ryu (85kg).
      Fighter(int w, java.lang.String n)
      Creates a custom fighter, with weight specified by the programmer.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkDead()
      Checks if the fighter is dead, changes status to false if so.
      double getHealth()
      Returns health of fighter.
      double getPunchPower()
      Returns pPower.
      void punch(Fighter f) 
      void ressurection()
      Resurrects the fighter with reduced punch power.
      void shoryuken(Fighter f) 
      void takeHealth(double x)
      Subtracts x from the total health.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Fighter

        Creates a default fighter, in this case Ryu (85kg).

       java.lang.String n)
        Creates a custom fighter, with weight specified by the programmer.

    • Method Detail

      • takeHealth

        public void takeHealth(double x)
        Subtracts x from the total health.

      • punch

        public void punch(Fighter f)
        Parameters:
        Fighter - f: Use another fighter class object. The fighter object punches the fighter in the explicit parameters.

      • shoryuken

        public void shoryuken(Fighter f)
        Parameters:
        Fighter - f: Use another fighter class object. The fighter object punches the fighter in the explicit parameters while spinning in the air, punch power is doubled.

      • getHealth

        public double getHealth()
        Returns health of fighter.
        Returns:

      • getPunchPower

        public double getPunchPower()
        Returns pPower.

        Checks if the fighter is dead, changes status to false if so.

      • ressurection

        public void ressurection()
        Resurrects the fighter with reduced punch power.
